accounts.description: Spearheaded the overhaul of development workflows, enhancing efficiency and developer experience by integrating scripts, Github Actions, and Terraform. This automation streamlined the deployment process, reducing errors and boosting productivity.
Actively mentored junior developers in code practices, ensuring comprehensive understanding and fostering a knowledge-rich environment.
Played a pivotal role in designing and implementing APIs to support a 100X user base increase within a month, showcasing ability to handle rapid scalability.
Optimized database queries and API code, achieving a 30% reduction in infrastructure costs through enhanced response times.
Developed a machine learning system with 93% accuracy using Python and Jupyter notebooks to identify and mitigate risks from bad actors.
Successfully completed numerous contracts across diverse languages and platforms (including WordPress, Next.js, Node.js), achieving high client satisfaction and efficient project delivery.
Provided expert guidance to clients on development direction, ensuring optimal solutions for their needs.
Demonstrated leadership in expanding the business, hiring and training 3 employees, and managing industry outreach efforts to establish robust professional networks.
Successfully led the development and deployment of 7 custom instances of the Thirdstream platform, integrating with various banking institutions and third-party services.
Offered personalized support to developers, leading initiatives to instill industry-standard best practices and enhance long-term code quality and maintainability
Identified and rectified multiple security vulnerabilities, proposing preventive measures to safeguard against future risks.
Identified a critical bottleneck in the development process and led the development of a custom javascript library to address the issue, significantly improving operational efficiency.

Developed a modular service architecture using .Net Core and REST, including a custom Docusign integration, significantly enhancing HR and employee form generation and boosting business attraction and sales.
Implemented a Redis-based caching solution, dramatically improving database read-operation performance and scalability.
Led the development of an internal application to address inter-departmental bottlenecks, improving overall operating efficiency and user experience.
Collaborated with the Dev-Ops team to optimize Azure architecture, slashing operating expenses by over 50%.
Enhanced the performance of relational databases handling large datasets (1M+ records), significantly reducing runtime and processing requirements.
Worked with an external security firm to identify and patch platform vulnerabilities, including XSS, injection, and validation issues, fortifying system security
Led the development of a custom CI/CD pipeline to help QA and development teams streamline their processes, reducing deployment time by 50%.
Developed intricate SQL reports to determine ACA eligibility, earnings, and projected costs, providing valuable insights for clients.
Led a team in resolving client data issues and system inconsistencies, ensuring high client satisfaction and data integrity.
